original_text:
Is there anything of which one can say,
    “Look! This is something new”?
It was here already, long ago;
    it was here before our time.
korean_text: 무엇을 가리켜 이르기를 보라 이것이 새 것이라 할 것이 있으랴 우리가 있기 오래 전 세대들에도 이미 있었느니라

sentences.original_text: Is there anything of which one can say,
sentences.korean_translation: 사람이 말할 수 있는 것이 무엇이 있겠는가,

sentences.original_text: It was here already, long ago;
it was here before our time.
